name: Warrior +
overview:
French language text adventure. The inhabitants of a valley have been slain by the monster Graven. You decide to avenge the victims. The program randomly draws the four characteristics of your character (strength, dexterity, intelligence and hit points or vitality). Before entering the "dungeon" (3 levels, 130 coins) you spend your money on equipment. Choose from a menu: sword, shield, ax, weapon flail, armor, etc.

Faced with monsters, it is possible to flee, fight or parley. It is this last aspect which constitutes the only point of originality of the game. Weak monsters implore mercy and give information in exchange for their life. The others are trying to ransom you. Some bluff and engage in combat after long discussions. Graphically the game is very successful, as is the sound system. But what the hell a little originality! There are hundreds of “Labyrinth + Monsters” programs today.
